effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 451,766 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 233,681.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Use: Draw out a piece of the target's soul, decreasing their movement speed by 30% until the soul reaches you. The soul instantly heals you for 520,505, and grants you up to 9,597 Critical Strike for 16 sec. You gain more Critical Strike from lower health targets. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Carve a wax copy of your target, which absorbs 50% of their damage taken. The absorption heats up the wax, causing it to melt after absorbing 2.7 million damage. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,602 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 223,011 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,470 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crux of Blind Faith
